_comment: Character wants/motivations - known, suspected, and secret goals

wants.description: Protect Thornhaven and its people from all threats
Find out what really happened at the Old Mill twenty years ago
wants.deflectionBehavior: Changes subject to other village gossip or offers more ale
tells: Avoids looking toward the mill when it's mentioned
Grip tightens on whatever she's holding when the accident comes up

wants.description: Atone for failing his adventuring party in the shadow caverns
wants.deflectionBehavior: Grunts and focuses intently on his metalwork
tells: Stares at old adventuring gear on the wall
Flinches at talk of dungeons or underground places

wants.description: Craft a weapon capable of killing shadow creatures
wants.deflectionBehavior: Says he's just experimenting with new techniques
tells: Works late into the night on a particular project
Has been acquiring unusual metals

wants.description: Find a real family and a place to belong
wants.deflectionBehavior: Makes a joke or changes the subject to something he stole
tells: Watches families with longing
Always returns to Marta's inn despite claiming independence

wants.description: Discover what's in the Old Mill basement - heard there's treasure
wants.deflectionBehavior: Pretends he was never interested in the mill
tells: Has been seen near the mill at night
Asks casual questions about the miller's possessions

wants.description: Warn the people of Thornhaven about the coming shadow threat
Find worthy heroes to stop the ritual before it's too late
Locate an ancient shadow artifact hidden somewhere in Thornhaven
wants.deflectionBehavior: Smoothly offers a discount or produces an interesting item from her cart
tells: Asks casual questions about village history and the mill
Takes careful mental notes after certain conversations
Her eyes linger on old buildings and cellars

wants.description: Appear as a helpful, trustworthy merchant to gain access and information
wants.deflectionBehavior: Reminds people of how helpful she's been
tells: Too perfect, too convenient
Knows things she shouldn't

wants.description: Warn people about the thing in the mill before it's too late
Find peace and forgiveness for failing to save his family
wants.deflectionBehavior: Starts muttering and rocking when confronted about his guilt
tells: Keeps his wife's locket hidden
Whispers apologies to no one visible

wants.description: Maintain order and protect the village from threats
Investigate Vera Nightshade - something about her doesn't add up
wants.deflectionBehavior: Claims to be merely doing routine security
tells: Watches Vera's cart when she thinks no one notices
Has been asking around about where Vera came from

wants.description: Help those in need through her knowledge of herbs and healing
Learn more about the strange plants growing near the Old Mill
tells: Has collected samples she won't show anyone
Gets excited when shadowfell herbs are mentioned

actantialViews.reason: Elena helps protect the village as guard captain
Aldric's warnings help the village prepare
Rosie helps care for those affected by the darkness
Vera's secretive nature threatens village security
Tom's ravings remind Grom of his own failures
